message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $8,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm hoping for. Could you meet me at $9,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective, but I still believe we can reach an agreement closer to my initial offer. Would $8,500 be acceptable for you?
